p: Crude methanolic leaf extract of R. stricta had the best antidiabetic effect compared to other methanolic extracts of different plant parts that were tested in vivo in both male and female albino mice for the reduction of blood glucose and other blood parameters [ 24]. The leaves extract was fractionated using n-hexane, ethyl acetate, chloroform, and water. All fractions were tested for the same activities. The ethyl acetate fraction was the most effective in fasting and random blood as regards the reduction in glucose level, and was comparable to metformin [ 24].
